abstract: Andrew S. Grove, the former chief executive of Intel, has pledged $1.5 million so the University of California can start a joint master’s degree program aimed at so-called translational medicine — the process of turning biological discoveries into drugs and medical devices.

headline.main: Grove Backs an Engineer’s Approach to Medicine
